mapper.insert: insert into book_category (cate_id, parent_id, `name`, `status`, is_parent, created, updated) values (#{cateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update book_category set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_parent = #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where cate_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cate_id, parent_id, `name`, `status`, is_parent, created, updated from book_category
